name: Catch The Ghost
description:
*This game has been made by EasyGames Studio for the Brakeys' GameJam 2022.2*

(I will make also a devlog on my Youtube Channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5o4cbMuTVQFRKbPEBUGc8A ) Check it out!!!

Description

Two brothers are forced to stay home alone, because their parents had to do job interviews, but at some point they hear a terrifying sound ... so they take courage, take objects to defend themselves... a vacuum cleaner and a gun shoots wind. Then, at some point ...

What i have to do?
  • CATCH THE GHOSTS AROUND THE HOUSE
  • PICKUP ITEMS THAT YOU NEED TO HAVE TO MAKE MORE POINTS
  • TRY TO NOT THINKING ABOUT HOW MUCH THIS GAME IS TERRIBLY
